text: In comic books, Maverick may refer to: * Maverick (Dark Horse), a comics imprint of Dark Horse Comics * Maverick (G.I. Joe), a fictional character in the G.I. Joe universe * Maverick (Marvel Comics), a fictional character who appeared in the X-Men comics * An alias of the fictional character Chris Bradley (comics) in the X-Men comics * The Mavericks (comics), the New Mexico team of the Fifty State Initiative in Marvel Comics * Maverick, a 1959 Dell Comics series based on the Maverick TV series (1957-1962) ==See also== *Maverick (disambiguation)
title: Maverick (comics)
